reviews.text: We walked from our hotel to Glories shopping centre and stopped for the kids to play. There are 3 little parks. All enclosed. There's a basket ball court, we saw some table tennis and skaters using the facilities too.
Nice little park with old ruins. Won't keep you busy for hours, but a nice place off the beaten tracks. You won't see a lot of tourists there!

The Metropolitan Barcelona has many parks and oasis.
Parc del Clot is one of them.
Earlier, there was industri in this area. Trains for RENFE were build and repaired here.
In 1986 Barcelona designed the park.
They maintained part of the framework, and you see that like arches.
Parc del Clot has sportareas, playgrounds, rest-areas, fountains.
Parc del Clot is located in Sant Marti neighborhood, close to metro-stations "Clot" and "Glories".
You can combine your visit in the park with visiting Torre Agbar and Glories Center.
